projects.title: Code Karma
projects.description: Utilized GitHub API to create a platform for nonprofits to connect with highly qualified developers.
projects.skills: AngularJS - JavaScript - AJAX - JQuery - JQuery UI - HTML5 - Sass

projects.title: Hatchery
projects.description: Online inventory and ordering system for buying and selling farm-fresh eggs. Utilized Weather Underground API for a fun 'check on the chickens' feature.
projects.skills: AngularJS - JavaScript - JQuery - AJAX - HTML5 - Sass

projects.title: Petsy
projects.description: Utilized PetFinder and Etsy APIs to create an online petshop where users can adopt a dog and shop for its accessories all at once.
projects.skills: JavaScript - Handlebars - AJAX - JQuery - HTML5 - Sass

projects.title: brainsto.rm
projects.description: Created a brain game where users are challenged to solve math problems falling from the sky before they hit the ground. Math problems increase in difficulty and velocity.
